author: m0_ox
content: [bal@v5.0.0](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/bal%40v5.0.0) was just released. Major bump due to the breaking change from the early `bal-devnet-2` spec tests release - as agreed this morning on ACDT, there are now no changes to transaction receipts for EIP-7778. This release updates the EIP-7778 spec to reflect this and re-fills all tests. This should be up-to-date with the specs for `bal-devnet-2 ` now so please feel free to ping `@STEEL` if anything seems off ðŸ™‚
